MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL67 postcode area of Cemaes Bay, affecting a number of properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30 pm to repair broken equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:00 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:28 am on 5th February, 2021.
